resources.string: We need to access your location information to provide you with more accurate weather data. If you do not allow access to your location information, we will use network location to obtain your approximate location. Please note that network location may not be as accurate. We will not use your location information for any other purpose.
"This account has not yet registered, register now?"
"Thanks for letting me access your approximate location. But you know what would be great? If you allow me to know where you exactly are. Thank you!"
"Getting your exact location is important for this app. Please grant us fine location. Thank you :D"
